sentences.sContent: ‘Did you go into the supermarket?’ ‘No, we didn’t.’
sentences.sCn: “你们进超级市场了吗？”“我们没有进去。”

sentences.sContent: Shall we stop for a coffee?
sentences.sCn: 我们停下来喝杯咖啡好吗？

sentences.sContent: So we all travelled down to Brighton together.
sentences.sCn: 所以我们一起都去了布赖顿。

sentences.sContent: We declare our support for a government of national unity.
sentences.sCn: 我们宣布支持一个全国统一的政府。

sentences.sContent: We Italians are proud of our history.
sentences.sCn: 我们意大利人为自己的历史感到自豪。

trans.tranCn: 我们（主格）；笔者，本人（作者或演讲人使用）；朕，寡人
trans.tranOther: used by the person speaking or writing to refer to himself or herself and one or more other people
